Tag! You're It!

Play tag around the world with your friends!

What is it anyways?

Tag! You're It! is an Android game that lets you play tag with anyone else around the world. Play tag with any and all of your friends! Avoid being tagged or chase your target. The player who is it is always marked, but no one else can see each other if they aren't close enough, which keeps everyone on their toes. The distance that a player can reach to tag is customizable, among other features.

The innovation of this project is providing an interactive environment that utilizes and is dependent upon the location of the users, supports giving power to the user through custom rules, and finally is open-source. Also, unlike Geotagging and Geocaching, users can still interact with one another without leaving their area.

Development

Nathan Reline is currently the only developer on this project. Listed here are some of the tools that were used and the documentation.

  • Development Tools

  • JDK 8
  • Android SDK Manager - Android 4.0.4
  • Google Sign-In for Android
  • Google Maps Android API
  • Ubuntu 14.04.3 Server
  • MySQL 5.5.47-0
  • PHP 5.5.9-1

Keep the project alive!

The heart of an open-source project is kept beating by its contributors. While the development team plans to support the project to the best of their ability, extra hands are always helpful. Run over to the GitHub page, contact the developer(s) , or sign up as an Alpha tester if you're interested!
